hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said:“What the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) most enjoined when he was dying and breathing his last was: The prayer; and those whom your right hands possess.”

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلْ أَوْصَى رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: Did The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) Make A Will?
